text: Chitham is an English surname, a variant of Cheetham, probably derived from Cheetham in Lancashire, now part of Manchester. ==Notable people== *Sir Charles Carter Chitham (1886–1972), a British policeman who served mostly in India *Claire Chitham (born 1978), a New Zealand actress *Robert Chitham, a British architect and writer ==See also== *Cheetham (surname) Chitham
title: Chitham
